{"data": {"production":{"id":"suffragette","production_title":"Suffragette","production_status":3,"production_desc":"

Inspired by true events, Suffragette<\/em> movingly explores the passion and heartbreak of those who risked all they had for women’s right to vote – their jobs, their homes, their children, and even their lives.<\/p>

Academy Award nominees Carey Mulligan and Helena Bonham Carter, and three-time Academy Award winner Meryl Streep, lead the cast of the powerful drama about the fight for equality in early-20th-century Britain.<\/p>

The stirring story centers on Maud, a working wife and mother who becomes an activist for the Suffragette cause alongside women from all walks of life. Suffragette<\/em> is directed by BAFTA Award winner Sarah Gavron and written by Emmy Award winner Abi Morgan.<\/p>","in_theaters":"
